hi - I'm trying to set up clickbank integration for a different account in CB but can't save this in Newsbreak. I'm following the instructions here but it fails when I try to save: https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/34723784198157-How-to-integrate-with-ClickBank

Hey there! It sounds like you're having trouble with the ClickBank integration on NewsBreak. Let's make sure you're following the correct steps. First, ensure that you are using Version 8.0, as Version 7.0 is no longer supported. Double-check that the Click ID is being passed through all redirects to your landing page if you're using a custom one.
Here's a detailed guide on setting up a ClickBank Postback on NewsBreak: [How to set up a ClickBank Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/23746617571341-How-to-set-up-a-ClickBank-Postback-on-NewsBreak).
If you continue to face issues, please let me know!
that link doesnt work for me

I'm sorry to hear that the link isn't working for you. You can try accessing the article directly by visiting the NewsBreak Help Center and searching for "How to set up a ClickBank Postback on NewsBreak." If you're still having trouble, please let me know, and I'll do my best to assist you further!
can I get human assistance pls

I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away. If you need more detailed support, you can reach out to our team at adsupport@newsbreak.com.
